q1.question: What languages does LyDian Chat support?
q1.answer: LyDian Chat supports 40+ languages including English, Spanish, German, French, Chinese, Japanese, and more. Multi-language support available for both text and voice interaction.

q2.question: Is my data secure?
q2.answer: Yes. All your chats are protected with end-to-end encryption. Your data is not used for model training and is not shared with third parties.

q3.question: What file formats can I upload?
q3.answer: PDF, Word (DOCX), Excel (XLSX), PowerPoint (PPTX), image files (JPG, PNG, WebP), text files (TXT, MD), and code files are supported.

q4.question: How long is my chat history stored?
q4.answer: Free plan: 30 days, Pro plan: unlimited. You can delete or export your chats anytime.

q5.question: Is API access available?
q5.answer: Yes, API access is provided in Enterprise plan. You can integrate with your own applications and create custom chatbots.
